slides.title: Introduction to Prayer
slides.introductionText: Prayer is the way we communicate with Heavenly Father and receive guidance.

slides.title: The Persistent Widow
slides.description: A parable about persistence in prayer from Luke 18.
slides.historicalContext: Jesus taught this parable to encourage His disciples to pray and not give up.

scriptures.verse: And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him?

quotes.text: Prayers are always answered in the way and time God knows is best.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

thoughtProvokingQuestions: Why do you think persistence matters in prayer?
Have you ever felt an answer came after patience?

mediaPresentation.overlayQuote: Pray always, and do not lose heart.

slides.title: Applying Prayer in Our Lives
slides.summary: Prayer strengthens our relationship with God and gives us guidance.
mainPoints: Prayer is essential for spiritual growth.
Answers may come in ways we do not expect.

slides.title: Teacher Prep Guide
preparationAdvice: Prepare a personal experience about prayer to share
engagementTips: Invite class members to share times they've seen prayer answered.
